Key Match Events: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning, as the Pittsburgh Pirates avoided a three-game sweep with a 4-3 win over the Kansas City Royals on Sunday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the final game of the regular season series between the two teams, with the Royals winning 2-1.
Others: The game was played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, with an attendance of 20,078.
